game.name: Unicorn and Sweets 2
game.shortDescription: Unicorn and Sweets 2 is a match 3 category game made in combined 2D and 3D graphics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Unicorn and Sweets 2 is a match 3 category game made in combined 2D and 3D graphics.

reviewHighlights.text: Unicorn and Sweets 2 is a "template flip", that is to say, it's a "game" that has been produced by copying a game template from GameMaker Studio, chan...
would not recommend even for $1. boiler plate puzzle game with no development. save your money
